meanings.definition: Difficult or impossible to manage or control.
meanings.sent1: The wild horse was unmanageable, refusing to be tamed.
meanings.sent2: The toddler became unmanageable when he didn't get his way.
meanings.sent3: The unmanageable puppy kept running in circles, chasing its tail.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were like an unmanageable storm, unpredictable and fierce.
meanings.sent5: The unmanageable situation spiraled out of control, causing chaos.

meanings.definition: Not capable of being managed or controlled.
meanings.sent1: The overflowing inbox was unmanageable, with emails piling up.
meanings.sent2: The unmanageable traffic made him late for the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The unmanageable garden grew wildly, overtaking the yard.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was unmanageable in the humidity, frizzing up instantly.
meanings.sent5: The unmanageable workload seemed never-ending, overwhelming her.
